text: The Syndicat des Cols Bleus de la Ville de Laval is a trade union representing blue-collar workers in Laval, Quebec, Canada. It was established in 1965 and has been an affiliate of the Canadian Union of Public Employees since 2000.Historique du Syndicat, Syndicat des Cols Bleus de la Ville de Laval, accessed 7 April 2011. ==External links== *Syndicat des Cols Bleus de la Ville de Laval ==References== Category:Canadian Union of Public Employees Category:Laval, Quebec
title: Syndicat des Cols Bleus de la Ville de Laval
